data.title: Highest-paid CEOs run worst-performing companies, research finds

Kiwi Athlete kidnapped by Rio police Harassed a second time.

The mother-in-law of Formula One boss Bernie Ecclestone has been kidnapped in Brazil with criminals demanding a ransom of $36.5m (£28m), reports say. Aparecida Schunck, the 67-year-old mother of Mr Ecclestone's wife Fabiana Flosi, was seized in Sao Paulo on Friday night, Veja and Globo reported.
